Hyper Issue 252 - 2014  AU

100 Pages | True PDF | English | 35 MB

Thirteen years on and still going strong, Hyper is the essential videogame magazine for serious gamers Australia wide. Informative and irreverent, Hyper covers it all, from current generation consoles, handlhelds and PCs, all the way through to the PS3, Xbox and Wii. Plus, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll get a healthy dose of retro gaming, online gaming, DVD and anime reviews, hardware and technology. If you want a source you can trust with 100% Australian content, get Hyper.

NAG Magazine - September 2014  ZA

108 Pages | True PDF | English | 22 MB

NAG Magazine's contempory content covers video gaming, computers, gaming consoles, computer peripherals, gadgets, computer hardware and anything else that relates to having interactive fun in the 21st century; and also profiles the technology, people and companies driving the multi-billion-dollar international gaming industry.

Official PlayStation Magazine - October 2014  UK

120 Pages | True PDF | English | 31 MB 

Each month we bring together the most exciting news, views and reviews on planet PlayStation. Direct access to Sony means you find out about the important stuff first, but our editorial independence also enables us to put together an unflinchingly honest reviews section, ensuring you never have to buy a bad game again.
